tool.name: TrimN
tool.command: python '$__tool_directory__/remove_fake_cut_sites_DNAnexus.py' $fasta_in step1_out.fasta step1.log && python '$__tool_directory__/trim_Ns_DNAnexus.py' $fasta_in step2_out.list && python '$__tool_directory__/clip_regions_DNAnexus.py' step1_out.fasta step2_out.list final_out.fasta

param.name: fasta_in
param.label: Fasta file input
param.help: Fasta file to trim, and from which to remove Ns and fake cut sites.

tool.help: TrimNs is part of the VGP pipeline, and is made of a series of python scripts which trim off large stretches of N bases and to remove fake cut sites that sometimes get inserted at the end of bionano hybrid scaffolds.
